## PoiTableRef interface

Definition for a \[\[PoiTable\]\] reference as part of the \[\[Theme\]\] object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PoiTableRef 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [name](./harp-datasource-protocol.poitableref.name.md) | string | Required name of the \[\[PoiTable\]\] for later reference. |
|  [url](./harp-datasource-protocol.poitableref.url.md) | string | Required URL from where to load \[\[PoiTable\]\].<!-- -->Should refer to JSON that is matched \[\[PoiTableDef\]\] interface. |
|  [useAltNamesForKey](./harp-datasource-protocol.poitableref.usealtnamesforkey.md) | boolean | If set to <code>true</code>, the list of values in the field "altNames" will be used as names for this POI. |
